name: 馮元玫
objective:
這個學期已經開始了一個星期。 目前在台北校區的10名學生已經學習了將近一年的漢語，並且達到了中級水平。 經過討論，我們決定使用“今日台灣”中級教科書進行教學，這與台灣的文化和習俗有關，著重於閱讀和討論。 教學大綱也將進行調整。
This semester has started for a week. The 10 students currently in the Taipei campus , have studied Chinese almost for one year and have an intermediate level. After discussion, we decided to use the intermediate textbook of “Taiwan Today” to teach, It is related to Taiwanese culture and customs, focusing on reading and discussion. The syllabus will also be adjusted.
